ValidationRule.description: Prevents completion of deceased cases without the fields needed - date of death, date confirmed etc
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "Deceased" && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Complete") && ( ISNULL( DateOfDeath__c ) || ISNULL( DateDeathConfirmed__c ) || ISPICKVAL( DeathCertificateReceived__c, "" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out the date of death, date death confirmed and death certificate sections.
